Coursework

Below is a list of the relevant courses that I've taken during my time at UC Berkeley.

Computer Science

  • Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs (CS 61A)
  • Data Structures (CS 61B)
  • Machine Architecture (CS 61C)
  • Efficient Algorithms and Intractable Problems (CS 170)
  • Introduction to Database Systems (CS 186)
  • Artificial Intelligence (CS 188)
  • Introduction to Machine Learning (CS 189)
  • Quantum Computation and Information Science (CS C191)
  • Special Topics in Deep Learning (CS 294, Graduate)
  • Designing Information Devices and Systems (EE 16A)

Mathematics

  • Multivariable Calculus (Math 53)
  • Linear Algebra and Differential Equations (Math 54)
  • Discrete Mathematics and Probability Theory (CS 70)

Physics

  • Honors Mechanics (Physics H7A)
  • Honors Electricity and Magnetism (Physics H7B)
  • Honors Optics, Relativity, and Quantum Mechanics (Physics H7C)
  • Introduction to Computational Techniques in Physics (Physics 77)
